text: Andrea Rossi may refer to: * Andrea Rossi (economist), Policy Fellow and Program Director at Harvard University and United Nations Officer * Andrea Rossi (footballer) (born 1986), Italian football (soccer) defender * Andrea Rossi (entrepreneur) (born 1950), Italian businessman and inventor * Andrea Rossi (sport shooter) (born 1991), Swiss sport shooter ==See also== * Andrea de Rossi (born 1972), Italian rugby coach and former rugby union footballer * Andrea de Rossi (archbishop) (1644–1696)
title: Andrea Rossi
